generationPrompt:
Create a professional Official Facebook logo for authentication for the Compozit Vision interior design mobile application.

ASSET DETAILS:
- Name: facebook-official-logo
- Purpose: Authentic social login appearance
- Emotion/Feel: Trust, familiarity, authenticity
- Style: Official brand guidelines
- Category: brand

VISUAL REQUIREMENTS:
- Dimensions: 32x32 pixels
- Primary Colors: #C9A98C (warm beige), #B9906F (brown), #FDFBF7 (cream background)
- Text Color: #1C1C1C (dark charcoal)
- Quality: High-resolution, professional grade
- Format: Optimized for mobile app interface

SPECIFIC CONTENT:
Official Facebook "f" logo with correct blue color and styling

STYLE GUIDELINES:
- Premium, luxury interior design aesthetic
- Clean, modern, sophisticated look
- Brand-consistent color palette
- Mobile-optimized clarity and readability
- Professional photography/design quality



Generate a high-quality png image that meets these specifications exactly.
